programme.title: Ramaiya Vastavaiya
programme.desc: Ramaiya Vastavaiya is a romantic drama directed by Prabhu Deva. It revolves around Ram (Girish Kumar), a rich and carefree NRI, who falls in love with Sona (Shruti Haasan), a simple village girl. When he proposes marriage, her protective brother (Sonu Sood) challenges him to prove that he can live and work like a farmer before earning her hand. Set in vibrant rural India, the film blends romance, comedy, and family drama with catchy music and traditional values.

programme.title: Kismat Konnection
programme.desc: Directed by Aziz Mirza, this romantic comedy stars Shahid Kapoor as Raj Malhotra, an unsuccessful architect whose luck turns around after meeting Priya (Vidya Balan). As he starts attributing his success to her, complications arise, leading to a tale of love, destiny, and self-discovery.

programme.title: Awarapan
programme.desc: Directed by Mohit Suri, Awarapan stars Emraan Hashmi as a tormented hitman working for a crime lord. When he's assigned to monitor his boss's mistress, he begins to question his life choices, leading to a path of self-discovery and redemption. The film is an uncredited remake of the South Korean movie A Bittersweet Life.

programme.title: Apna Sapna Money Money
programme.desc: Directed by Sangeeth Sivan, this ensemble comedy follows a colorful cast including a cross-dressing conman, a gangster, and a fake priest all scheming to get rich quick. The film features Suniel Shetty, Ritesh Deshmukh, and Shreyas Talpade, and offers a mix of slapstick humor and mistaken identities.

programme.title: Commando 3
programme.desc: Commando 3 is an action-packed thriller that follows Karanveer Singh Dogra (played by Vidyut Jammwal), an elite Indian commando, who is sent on a mission to London to track down and eliminate a terrorist threat. As he uncovers a deadly plot aimed at dividing India on religious lines, he must use his combat skills and intelligence to protect his country. With high-octane stunts, intense chase sequences, and a patriotic theme, the film keeps audiences on edge. Directed by Aditya Datt, itâ€™s the third installment in the Commando series.
